dcterms:creator: Alberto Abadie
Alexis Diamond
Jens Hainmueller
dcterms:description: This dataset contains annual per-capita cigarette sales data across several states that did not implement a similar tobacco control program, used to estimate California's counterfactual outcome regarding smoking rates after the implementation of the tobacco control program in 1988.
dcterms:title: Tobacco Control Program in California

dcterms:creator: Alberto Abadie
Javier Gardeazabal
dcterms:description: This dataset includes annual Spanish regional-level panel data from 1955 to 1997, focusing on the economic impact of terrorist conflict in the Basque Country on GDP.
dcterms:title: Terrorist Conflict in the Basque Country

dcterms:creator: Alberto Abadie
Alexis Diamond
Jens Hainmueller
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of annual panel data at the country level from 1960 to 2003, used to analyze the economic effects of the reunification of Germany on GDP.
dcterms:title: Reunification of Germany
